com.dukascopy.api

Interface IClientChartPresentationManager


  • public interface IClientChartPresentationManager
    Manages Chart presentation modes (Period, DataType, etc.).
    NOTE: Used only by Standalone JForex API.
    See Also:
    IChart, IClientGUI

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • setFeedDescriptor

        void setFeedDescriptor(IFeedDescriptor feedDescriptor)
        Changes bundle of chart's feed data properties at once.
        The Filter value of the IFeedDescriptor is set globally and propagated to all open charts.
        Parameters:
        feedDescriptor - - see IFeedDescriptor
        See Also:
        setFilter(Filter), getFilter(), setInstrument(Instrument), switchOfferSide(OfferSide)

      • setInstrument

        Changes current Instrument to specified one
        Parameters:
        instrument - new active Instrument

      • setDataPresentationType

        void setDataPresentationType(DataType.DataPresentationType dataPresentationType)
        Applies DataPresentationType to current chart. Use IChart.getDataType().getSupportedPresentationTypes() to get all allowed values. Use IChart.getDataType().isPresentationTypeSupported(DataPresentationType presentationType) to check whether current DataType supports presentationType or not.
        Parameters:
        presentationType - one of DataPresentationType constants, supported by current DataType
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if DataPresentationType is not supported by current DataType
        See Also:
        IChart#setDataPresentationType(DataPresentationType), IChart.getDataType()

      • getDataPresentationType

        DataType.DataPresentationType getDataPresentationType()
        Returns charts' current DataType.DataPresentationType. Depends on current DataType value
        See Also:
        IChart.getDataPresentationType(), IChart.getDataType()

      • switchOfferSide

        void switchOfferSide(OfferSide offerSide)
        Switches OfferSide
        Parameters:
        offerSide -

      • setFilter

        void setFilter(Filter filter)
        Sets the Filter globally which will be propagated to all open charts.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter to filter flats data

      • getFilter

        Filter getFilter()
        Returns:
        the Filter which is shared by all ICharts

      • getTheme

        IChartTheme getTheme()
        Returns current chart theme. If the theme is among IChartTheme.Predefined, then a copy of the theme gets returned
        Returns:
        the current chart theme

        Parameters:
